entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 early this evening then becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023
